TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EventBuilder extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices._EventBuilder

remarks.format: ## Remarks An `EventBuilder` is always associated with a `TypeBuilder`. The TypeBuilder.DefineEvent method will return a new `EventBuilder` to a client.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddOtherMethod (System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder mdBuilder);
.method public hidebysig instance void AddOtherMethod(class System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder mdBuilder) cil managed

Docs.param: A object that represents the other method.
Docs.summary: Adds one of the "other" methods associated with this event. "Other" methods are methods other than the "on" and "raise" methods associated with an event. This function can be called many times to add as many "other" methods.
Docs.exception: has been called on the enclosing type.

MemberSignature.Value: void _EventBuilder.GetIDsOfNames (ref Guid riid, IntPtr rgszNames, uint cNames, uint lcid, IntPtr rgDispId);

.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Runtime.InteropServices._EventBuilder.GetIDsOfNames(valuetype System.Guid riid, native int rgszNames, unsigned int32 cNames, unsigned int32 lcid, native int rgDispId) cil managed

Docs.param: Reserved for future use. Must be IID_NULL.
Passed-in array of names to be mapped.
Count of the names to be mapped.
The locale context in which to interpret the names.
Caller-allocated array which receives the IDs corresponding to the names.
Docs.summary: Maps a set of names to a corresponding set of dispatch identifiers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. For more information about `IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`, see the MSDN Library.

Docs.exception: The method is called late-bound using the COM `IDispatch` interface.

Reserved for future use. Must be IID_NULL.
The locale context in which to interpret arguments.
Flags describing the context of the call.
